actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to restore a preferential capital gains rate for timber.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to reduce the maximum rate of tax on net capital gains realized from timber from: (1) 34 percent to 28 percent with respect to corporations; and (2) 28 percent to 20 percent for individuals.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to restore a preferential capital gains rate for timber.
